articles.title: The ‘Toyification’ of Beauty Is Here to Stay
articles.mainIdea: The ‘Toyification’ of Beauty Is Here to Stay
articles.summary: WWD: The ‘Toyification’ of Beauty Is Here to Stay. Brands like Daise and Notewrks are increasingly fashioning their products, packaging and marketing in toy-like ways.
